bio: Turned pro in 1983. Played on the Varsity Tennis Team and Earned degree in Psychology from University of Miami and a minor in Business. Current Hobbies include spinning, working out and spending time with my animals .Still enjoys playing tennis on a regular basis. Current employment: Key Account Manager for Alpine Fresh, INC. in Doral, FL. Member of LinkedIn. Wife, Cathy. Daughters Allegra (1994) is a Junior at Florida State University and Ashley (1996) will be attending Florida State University in 2015.
